entry.title: Scaramucci Touts Bitcoin Alongside Gold, Counters Jamie Dimon on Risk
entry.summary: SkyBridge Capital's founder challenges Dimon's view on Bitcoin, suggesting more research could change his mind.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Trading Is Surging With Halving Just Two Months Away
entry.summary: The cross-chain marketplace has become traders’ favorite as the controversial Ordinals inscriptions make a comeback.

entry.title: Other Page Brings Enhanced Web3 Profiles to Magic Eden NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: The partnership will enable Magic Eden users to “flex the lore and legacy” of their avatars and digital assets through Other Page.

entry.title: The Entire Luxury Industry Is About to Embrace Crypto, Says Aura CEO
entry.summary: Luxury brands, in part thanks to a new EU law, are set to embrace on-chain digital passports connected to their products. The Aura Blockchain Consortium is leading that charge.

entry.title: Champions Tactics Preview: Everything You Need to Know About Ubisoft's NFT Game
entry.summary: UPDATED: Champions Tactics: Grimoria Chronicles is a PVP game with figurine-style NFT characters. Here's everything you need to know.

entry.title: Comedian Trevor Noah Says the Biggest Mistake He's Ever Made Is Not Buying Bitcoin
entry.summary: On stage in front of tech enthusiasts, Noah opened up about his journey in investing, taking risks, and missed opportunities.

entry.title: Ethereum’s Dencun Upgrade: Technical Overview and Potential Market Impact
entry.summary: Dencun introduces "proto-danksharding" to Ethereum, aiming to decrease transaction costs for layer-2 blockchains and address scalability.

entry.title: Apple Car Project Titan Killed As Tim Cook Leans Into AI: Report
entry.summary: Even after logging 450,000 miles of California road testing last year, autonomous vehicle development is out. AI is totally in.

entry.title: Portal Pre-Market Trading Spikes Ahead of Ethereum Gaming Token Drop
entry.summary: Whales Market has already logged over $5 million worth of Portal trades as the price climbs ahead of Thursday’s listing.

entry.title: Altcoins Theta, Pyth, and Stacks Surge With Bitcoin in Latest Crypto Rally
entry.summary: Bitcoin is flying high thanks to institutional interest in crypto ETFs, and the updraft is lifting altcoins to big gains in a burgeoning bull market.

entry.title: ‘Newborn Nine’ Bitcoin ETFs Now Hold 300,000 BTC—Over $17 Billion Worth
entry.summary: The firms behind the newly approved spot Bitcoin ETFs already hold more than 300,000 BTC—but Grayscale alone holds even more.

entry.title: Nobody Trades Bitcoin on Weekends Anymore—Here's Why Liquidity Is Dwindling
entry.summary: The nonstop crypto markets have Saturday and Sunday to themselves, but coin traders are increasingly taking those days off, too.

entry.title: Ubisoft Taps AI Analytics Firm to Bolster 'Champions Tactics' NFT Game Launch
entry.summary: Assassin’s Creed maker Ubisoft is working with Helika, an analytics startup that has worked with Yuga Labs, Pudgy Penguins, and more.

entry.title: Crypto Gaming Firm Gala Launches GalaSwap Exchange With Token Rewards
entry.summary: The layer-1 GalaChain is getting more useful as Gala launches the GalaSwap decentralized exchange with token rewards and referral incentives.

entry.title: Ethereum Gains on Bullish Sentiment and Institutional Interest
entry.summary: Ethereum (ETH) is riding today’s bullish wave, climbing 3% in the last 24 hours, to a price that traders hadn’t seen since April 2022.

entry.title: Casper Network: Opening a 'New World of Possibilities' Beyond Enterprise Users
entry.summary: Casper Network's Director of Ecosystem Alizee Carli and Head of Content Joe Benso join Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about how the Layer 1 blockchain is expanding beyond its enterprise user base to Web3-native projects.

entry.title: Decrypt, Rug Radio Unveil New Decentralized Publishing Company DASTAN at R HAUS Paris
entry.summary: DASTAN is the product of the merger between Rug Radio and Decrypt, creating the world’s biggest decentralized publishing company.

entry.title: Ethereum's PEPE Leaps 36% While Solana Meme Coins WIF and BONK Rally
entry.summary: Pepe's market cap is back above $900 million for the first time since May 2023.

entry.summary: With 400,000+ users, crypto game aggregator Earn Alliance is now aiming to bring traditional gamers into the space via an airdrop.

entry.title: VanEck Web3 Lead: Tokenized Real Estate the 'Holy Grail'
entry.summary: VanEck's Head of NFT Community and Web3, Matt Bartlett, joined Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss the launch of its new NFT platform Segment.io, and the need for regulatory clarity in the NFT space.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds at $56K as Liquidated Short Tally Reaches $280 Million
entry.summary: Bitcoin open interest has now surpassed $25 billion, according to Coinglass data.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Blasts Past $56,000, Yielding $157 Million in Liquidated Shorts
entry.summary: Bitcoin is swimming in territory not seen since its all-time high in November 2021, even as holders cash in.

entry.title: Bitcoin Ordinals Wallets Will Soon Be Showered With Runestones—Here’s What You Need to Know
entry.summary: The largest inscriptions airdrop will commemorate the first year of the Ordinals protocol and pave the way toward the release of Casey Rodarmor's Runes project.

entry.title: Mistral AI Launches High-Performance AI Model and Chatbot to Challenge ChatGPT, Claude and Gemini
entry.summary: The French AI startup, known for its high-performing open-source models, has launched a proprietary LLM that stands up well in top benchmarks.

entry.title: Bored Ape Game 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged' Will Pay Out Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: The free-to-play version of Dookey Dash is teasing a huge prize pool and an early access event that awards a Mutant Ape NFT.

entry.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Records All-Time High $1.3 Billion in Single-Day Volume
entry.summary: The price of Bitcoin is up nearly 5% on the day, trading just below $55,000 per coin.

entry.title: Orangie Plays 'Dookey Dash: Unclogged,' the Bored Ape Game With Over $1 Million in Prizes
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Orangie shares a first look at an early version of Dookey Dash: Unclogged, the new free-to-play version of 2023's crypto gaming sensation. Yuga Labs is releasing the new version of the game this spring with over $1 million in prizes up for grabs.

entry.title: Google DeepMind Unveils AI ‘Genie’ to Instantly Conjure Playable Games
entry.summary: Trained on over 200,000 hours of gameplay videos, the experimental model can turn any image or idea into a 2D platformer.

entry.title: After Genesis Sale Approval Bump, Grayscale Bitcoin Trust Sell-Off Slows
entry.summary: Grayscale's GBTC has seen nonstop outflows totaling $7.4 billion since its ETF conversion.

entry.title: Bitcoin Funds Gain $600M as ETFs Remain Hot Despite Slight Slowdown
entry.summary: Crypto funds like the new Bitcoin ETFs continue to receive inflows—but at a slower rate than the torrent seen earlier this month.

entry.title: Exit Scam? Bitcoin Exchange BitForex Shutters After $57M Mysteriously Withdrawn
entry.summary: The cryptocurrency exchange BitForex blocked users and went silent after moving $57 million in funds, sparking fears of an exit scam.

entry.title: Xai Launching Staking Rewards for Ethereum Gaming Network—Here's How It Works
entry.summary: Arbitrum layer-3 gaming network Xai is set to launch staking rewards this week, with an expansion set for March. Here are the first details.

entry.title: MicroStrategy Bitcoin Stash Swells to $10.28 Billion as Firm Buys More BTC
entry.summary: Post-ETF boosts and pre-halving anticipation have rocketed the company’s BTC position over $4 billion into the black.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Surges Above $53,000 for First Time Since 2021
entry.summary: Top coins are gaining again, with Bitcoin finally breaking through the $53K barrier and Ethereum pushing above $3,100.

entry.title: Ethereum Price at 22-Month High as Open Interest Soars and Dencun Nears
entry.summary: The second largest digital asset continues to surge as its vital upgrade approaches.

entry.title: How Paris Saint-Germain FC Joined Chiliz as a Validator
entry.summary: Chiliz Chief Strategy Officer Max Rabinovitch joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to discuss Paris Saint-Germain FC joining its network as a validator, and how consequential Web3 adoption in sport will come from the grassroots.

entry.title: The Sandbox Co-Founder Sébastien Borget: 'The Future of Gaming is User-Generated Content'
entry.summary: Sébastien Borget, COO and co-founder of The Sandbox, joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse platform's launch of user-generated content, AI in gaming, and open metaverse standards.

entry.title: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus: How Web3 Filmmaking is 'Taking the Castle'
entry.summary: Miguel Faus, director of NFT-funded feature film "Calladita," joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the film's recent premiere and how the "radically independent" decentralized Film3 movement is evolving.

entry.title: Pudgy Penguins Teams Up With Unstoppable Domains
entry.summary: Pudgy Penguins CEO Luca Netz and Unstoppable Domains COO Sandy Carter joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the launch of the NFT collection's .pudgy domains, its second line of toys at Walmat, and the upcoming launch of the Pudgy World game.

entry.title: Improbable Chief Product Officer: Web3 Games Need to Put Experience, Game Logic Onchain
entry.summary: Improbable's Rob Whitehead joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk about the metaverse technology firm's collaborations with blue-chip NFT collections, and how adding tens of thousands of players to a game will work in practice.

entry.title: Ledger: 'Probably Five Years' Before Phones With Fully Integrated Hardware Wallets
entry.summary: Ledger's Chief Experience Officer Ian Rogers sat down with Decrypt's Stephen Graves at NFT Paris to talk security, hacks, and where the current generation of smartphone crypto wallets fall short.

entry.title: What Is Notcoin? Co-Creator Sasha Plotvinov Explains the Viral Telegram Game and Token
entry.summary: Notcoin, a simple clicker-style game within messaging app Telegram, has racked up over 25 million players since the start of 2024 and plans to convert the trillions of virtual coins mined so far into a real crypto token on The Open Network. Open Builders founder Sasha Plotvinov joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to explain the viral phenomenon.

entry.title: 'Pixels' Founder Luke Barwikowski on the Game's Wild Rise and Ronin Move
entry.summary: Ahead of the PIXEL token launch, Pixels game founder Luke Barwikowski joins Decrypt's Andrew Hayward to discuss the hectic last few months—and why the game migrated between Ethereum scaling networks, from Polygon to Ronin.

entry.title: How Arbitrum Won the 'ApeChain' Vote for an ApeCoin Ethereum Scaler
entry.summary: Offchain Labs co-founder and CEO Steven Goldfeder joined Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to discuss the ApeCoin DAO's vote to create an Ethereum layer-2 gaming network on Arbitrum for the Bored Ape Yacht Club ecosystem.

entry.title: Recommend-To-Earn: Tokenizing Travel Recommendations with Sam Simmons
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Sam Simmons, founder of MintPass.
They discuss: - The Parallels between Professional Poker and Crypto - The profitability of Ethics - The "Recommend-To-Earn" economy

entry.title: The Collected: Grant Riven Yun's Journey Through Art and Medicine
entry.summary: The Collected's Rachel Wilkins joins digital artist Grant Riven Yun to explore his remarkable journey blending art with medical studies, to achieve over $2 million in sales.

entry.title: Nifty Island Co-Founder on Why Play-to-Airdrop Is the Game's 'Booster Rocket'
entry.summary: Nifty Island co-founder Charles Smith joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the game's play-to-airdrop campaign, why token incentives are so important to getting crypto games off the ground, and how the team plans to sustain its growth going forward.

entry.title: Pixels: The Hot Crypto Game and Airdrop Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the popular Ronin farming game Pixels and details around the upcoming PIXEL token airdrop.

entry.title: Ethereum Scaler Blast Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains Ethereum layer-2 scaling network Blast, from the creators of top NFT marketplace Blur, including its upcoming airdrop and how to participate.

entry.title: Pixels Founder: Why PIXEL Token Launch Feels Like 'Day One' for Ronin Game
entry.summary: Luke Barwikowski, founder of farming game Pixels on Ronin, joins Decrypt Culture Editor Andrew Hayward to discuss the incoming launch of the PIXEL token and why he sees it as such a turning point for the rising blockchain game.

entry.title: Animoca’s Yat Siu: How Crypto Gaming Gains Mass Adoption
entry.summary: Yat Siu, CEO and co-founder of Animoca Brands, joins the FOMO Hour to discuss his view of the Web3 gaming space, how 2024 is already shaping up to be a big year for crypto gaming, the importance of education in the Web3 space, and much, much more.

entry.title: Shrapnel STX1 Early Access Gameplay
entry.summary: Gameplay footage from the STX1 early access gameplay demo of Shrapnel, a first-person shooter built on Avalanche.
